Magister Belas:
We help those who give the Unworldly Visitors a helping hand to teleport to key locations in the Garden of Spirits.
Remember that teleporting from here to key locations in the Garden of Spirits is available only to those whose faction level with the Unworldly Visitors is 2 or higher. Teleporting from key locations in the Garden of Spirits to this location is provided only to those who have a faction level of 4 or higher with the Unworldly Visitors.
